description: Internal alterations and refurbishment of all floors; removal of non-original stone staircase and replaced with staircase and mezzanine floor. Addition of flat roof light to rear  roof; replacement of timber fenestration of rear addition with aluminium slim-line double glazed crittall fenestration; removal of an floor finish to the rear part of the lower ground floor and adding underfloor heating system on top of an existing concrete slab; installation of air conditioning units throughout the property and installation of 3No condenser units with acoustic enclosure at  lower ground floor rear garden; removal of sloping glass roof at first-floor level and replacing it with timber frame, lead clad extension to accommodate an ensuite to first-floor master bedroom
